query:
-- 为WHY用户添加2262Li账户的权限
INSERT INTO staffStockPermissions (staffUserId, stockUserId, createdBy, createdAt)
VALUES (
  (SELECT id FROM users WHERE username = 'WHY'),
  (SELECT id FROM stockUsers WHERE name = '2262Li'),
  (SELECT id FROM users WHERE username = 'runyi'),
  NOW()
);

-- 验证插入结果
SELECT ssp.*, su.name as stockUserName
FROM staffStockPermissions ssp
JOIN stockUsers su ON ssp.stockUserId = su.id
WHERE ssp.staffUserId IN (SELECT id FROM users WHERE username = 'WHY')
ORDER BY ssp.createdAt DESC;
